name: Ice Cream Flavor Descriptions
goal_statement: Maintenance task allowing all Super Scoopers to recite ingredients in each ice cream flavor. At least two flavors will be turned over every season, therefore, knowledge of ingredients in ice cream will be imperative to share with customers when Super Scooper is asked.
default_mastery_criteria: 3 consecutive shifts with all required steps Correct
step_description: Recite ingredients for vanilla ice cream from memory

name: Customer Greeting
goal_statement: <teammate> will independently demonstrate the ability to greet and state The Golden Scoop mission to a customer to increase customer service skills in 3 consecutive shifts of the most recent by <3 months>.
default_mastery_criteria: 3 consecutive shifts with all required steps Correct
step_description: Greet customer within 30 seconds of entry
